text: Mohamed Ben Rehaiem (), also known as Hamadi Agrebi () (20 March 1951 – 21 August 2020), was a Tunisian football midfielder. He played for Tunisia in the 1978 FIFA World Cup. He also played for CS Sfaxien. Rehaiem was born in Sfax, Tunisia. Rehaiem died on 21 August 2020 in Sfax, aged 69.Décès de la légende du football Hammadi Agrebi ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Tunisian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Tunis
title: Mohamed Ben Rehaiem
